title: 单人游戏内title指令提示执行成功，但是不显示标题
author: ktwap
txt_content:
/title @a subtitle ["",{"text":"to make a ","color":"gray","italic":"true"},{"text":"title","bold":"true","underlined":"true"},{"text":" Fuck ","color":"red","obfuscated":"true"}]复制代码指令如上！
